items.sentence: I read the French translation and I thought it sounded OK.
The months slipped by, and still there was no news of Tom.
Tom admitted that it was Mary who had organized the party.
Tom was in the kyudo club back when he was in high school.
The massive food shortages were caused by the bad harvest.
Let me remind you of something you seem to have forgotten.
Tom became a French teacher after getting out of the army.
In the summer, the days are long and the nights are short.
Most dogs like it when you scratch them behind their ears.
Tom didn't want what Mary gave him, so he gave it to John.
You're the only person I know who has ever visited Boston.
Indigenous Australians have eaten kangaroos for millennia.
Tom is going to wait until someone else does that for him.
The mammoth is a fascinating animal. Too bad it's extinct.
Does anyone know where I can buy a good used pickup truck?
Mary gets mad when she thinks her parents are judging her.
I'm still not sure about what I want to do when I grow up.
You should've told Tom that he wasn't supposed to do that.
You know that Tom is still planning to do that, don't you?
The building that was here was demolished three years ago.
